Package com.example.eventlottery

Class NotificationActivityTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.NotificationActivityTest
public class NotificationActivityTest extends Object
Unit tests for NotificationActivity Tests business logic for notification preferences and User object behavior

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    setUp()
    Sets up test fixtures before each test method Creates a test user for notification preference testing
    void
    testMultipleUsers_IndependentNotificationPreferences()
    Tests that multiple users can have different notification preferences Verifies that notification state is independent per user object
    void
    testNotificationSwitch_SimulateUserInteraction()
    Tests the scenario where notification is disabled then re-enabled Simulates the switch being toggled off and on in the UI
    void
    testUser_HasValidData()
    Tests that user has all required fields initialized Verifies all user data is non-null after creation
    void
    testUser_UserId()
    Tests that user ID is correctly set and retrieved Verifies the userId field matches expected value
    void
    testUserNotifications_ConsistentState()
    Tests that notification preference persists across multiple gets Verifies the getter returns consistent values
    void
    testUserNotifications_DefaultState()
    Tests that a new user has notifications enabled by default Verifies the default state when no preference has been set
    void
    testUserNotifications_DisableNotifications()
    Tests that user notifications can be disabled Verifies setNotifications correctly updates the state to false
    void
    testUserNotifications_EnableNotifications()
    Tests that user notifications can be enabled Verifies setNotifications correctly updates the state to true
    void
    testUserNotifications_MultipleUpdates()
    Tests that notification preference can be set multiple times Verifies the most recent value is always returned
    void
    testUserNotifications_ReturnsBooleanValue()
    Tests that notification preference is a boolean value Verifies getNotifications returns either true or false
    void
    testUserNotifications_ToggleFromDisabledToEnabled()
    Tests that notification preference can be toggled from disabled to enabled Verifies the state changes correctly when toggled back
    void
    testUserNotifications_ToggleFromEnabledToDisabled()
    Tests that notification preference can be toggled from enabled to disabled Verifies the state changes correctly when toggled
    void
    testUserNotifications_WithOtherUserData()
    Tests that user object maintains notification preference with other data Verifies notification state doesn't interfere with other user properties

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
